Detailed Description

Class for doing certain utility functions (basically things that cannot be logically organized into the other framework classes)

Member Function Documentation

static add_include_path (   $path )
static
Parameters
string $path
static bool_unset (   $var )
static

simple boolean replacement for PHP's native unset since 'unset' is a construct and not a function, it has no return value, so there's no way of knowing if the item was unset or not. (More specifically whether it existed to be unset in the first place)

Parameters
string
Returns
bool

recursively gets a list of all parents of a given class
